title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments:
Arpan Ghosh

Journalist, currently working for RTTNews for the last 1.5 years. Have worked for Star Sports previously and have 4 years of experience.

Location: Kolkata (would prefer WFH options due to family health problems).

I am available to take calls at all hours and the number can be shared when asked.

Frontend developer looking for remote work:

* Fresher
* HTML, CSS, Javascript
* ReactJS +React Redux +React Router, Next.js

DM for resume / projects / more info.

1. Accounts/Audit (2 years) 
2. Tally prime, Accounts reconciliation & Finalization, GST,  Income Tax. 
3. Kerala
4. PM's for resume and further details.

SDE
1. Fresher
2. Nit W ECE graduating 2023
3 .Amazon intern this summer

Posted this with my work-related Reddit account but it seems to be hidden--because of low karma, perhaps. So, posting it with my other account.

Looking for a Content Writer. 

1. Amigo Softcom LLP
2. MG Road, Gurgaon, Haryana
3. See the job description on [Indeed](https://in.indeed.com/job/content-writer-621b93c1b247d250). You'll be required to produce contents like the ones on our blog: [https://blog.tryamigo.com](https://blog.tryamigo.com)
4. Apply via the link provided with your resume and (preferably) a cover letter.
